title: FAST Exercises
introText: FAST helps you maintain self-respect while navigating relationships and difficult conversations. Practice being Fair, avoiding unnecessary Apologies, Sticking to your values, and being Truthful in all your interactions.

exercises.title: Start Small
exercises.description: Start small with simple requests, then role-play or practice bigger boundary-setting situations out loud. Build skills through progressive practice.

exercises.title: FAST Plan
exercises.description: Write your request, check fairness, honesty, and alignment with values, and avoid unnecessary apologies. Build confidence through thorough preparation.

exercises.title: Build Self-Respect
exercises.description: FAST isn't about being perfectâ€”it's about honoring yourself while maintaining healthy relationships. Practice these skills to build confidence in standing up for your values with kindness and integrity.
